question:
During a recent plane journey, you sat next to a businessman who owns a
chain of restaurants. You talked to him and he suggested that you should
contact him about a possible Job in one of his restaurants.
Write a letter to this businessman. In your letter
• remind him when and where you met
• tell him what kind of Job youaare inter,sted in
• say why you think you would be suitable for the Job
text: Hope this letter finds you well. I am Tip who sat next to you during a flight to the USA last week. I am writing with regard to your suggestion. I would like to apply for the  head chef position, and have a great interest in this position and would appreciate your consideration as a candidate for the role.

I graduated from Kasetsart University in 2010 with a First Class degree in the cooking field. At present, I am currently working as a head chef at ABC hotel. As you can see from my CV. I have been working as a chef for 12 years. I consider myself to be hard-working, reliable and motivated. I have a strong passion for cooking. I believe this position will give me the opportunity to gain more knowledge and experience, and I feel that my skill in cooking makes me well suited for this position. Please find enclosed references and resume.

I appreciate your time in reviewing this letter and hope to hear from you in regard to the next steps in the hiring process,  I am available to come for an interview any time at your convenience. If you need any additional information, please do not hesitate to contact me.
